Other Guide

Maven

Launch a Maven application in few steps.

Install Dependencies

This section assumes that you already have the WeDeploy CLI installed and Docker is running. Make sure to visit the installation guide if you need help setting that up.

Running Locally

  1. Start local infrastructure:

    we run

  2. Clone this repository:

    git clone https://github.com/wedeploy/boilerplate-maven.git
cd boilerplate-maven

  3. Link this container with the local infrastructure:

    we link

  4. Now your container is ready to be used:

    http://maven.<projectID>.wedeploy.me

Deploying to the Cloud

  1. Fork this repository.
  2. Go to the Dashboard.
  3. Create a project.
  4. In the sidebar, click on GitHub Integration.
  5. Type your repository URL and master branch.
  6. Click on Update Project.
  7. Click on Build All Repos and wait a few seconds.

  8. Once you see it in the Dashboard, your container will be ready to be used.

    http://maven.<projectID>.wedeploy.io

What's Next?

  • Now you can start building your Maven based application.
